attributes.action: Demand that parliament allows a General Election on the 15th October 2019
attributes.additional_details: The UK is becoming a laughing stock. We must have a General Election to give a clear mandate on what the people want. Our wonderful country is in a precarious position and MPs cannot & will not agree a tenable decision to end this mess. We must have a General Election to put an end to this on 15th October 2019.
attributes.background: We feel the current situation goes against democracy. We have a right to vote on who can deliver Brexit and it’s being taken away from us by MPs.
